caseTitle: Muhammad Azad @ Javaid @ Jadi v. The State
authorJudge: MR. JUSTICE QAZI MUHAMMAD AMIN AHMED
tagline: Accused’s guilt is proved to the hilt on the basis of chain of circumstances though few in number, nonetheless, well synchronized with one another, intrinsically confidence inspiring; he has rightly been convicted and sentenced to death given the brutality inflicted upon the abducted child.
